credit_line: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt from the collection of Mrs. Abram S. Hewitt
title: Decoration of a coach panel
provenance: Given by the Misses Hewitt from the Collection of Mrs. Abram S. Hewitt
medium: Brush and gray watercolor, pen and ink, black chalk on paper.
description: Vertical drawing of a lateral panel of a coach.  Wing-like.  "Summer" is shown seated upon clouds.  She carries a sickle in her right hand and a sheaf of grain in her left arm, which a child brought her.  Framing line.
name: Drawing
